Class Labels

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.googlecode.wickedcharts.highcharts.options.Labels

    public class Labels
extends Object
implements Serializable
    Defines some label in a chart.
    Author:
    Tom Hombergs (tom.hombergs@gmail.com)
    See Also:
    http://api.highcharts.com/highcharts#Axis.plotLines.label and others, Serialized Form
